name: ZorbaHomeAutomation
0:
”"Alexa, turn on fan"”
”"Alexa, activate morning lights"”
”"Alexa, turn off lights"”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Use this skill to control Zorba home/office automation devices. You will need a Zorba device to use this skill. The Zorba Sync account details are included with the device. 

Steps to use this skill after the installation of Zorba device is complete. 
- Install the Zorba app from the app stores.
- Add Zorba device(s) in the app
- Create scenes and master scenes as per your liking
- Then login to Zorba Sync and press Sync
- Then install the Zorba Home Automation skill.
- Login with the Zorba account details that came with your device
- Ask Alexa to discover devices
